database.filter:
users.username NOT LIKE 'TBB%' AND
candidate.status IN ('active', 'pending') AND
(candidate.country_id IS NULL OR candidate.country_id IN (6288,6296)) AND
candidate.id NOT IN (select candidate_id from candidate_saved_list where saved_list_id = (select id from saved_list where name = 'TestCandidates' and global = true));

table.name: test_jobseekers
table.populate: SELECT CAST(candidate_number AS int) AS user_id, EXTRACT(year FROM dob) AS birth_year, country_id, nationality_id, (SELECT location FROM candidate_attachment ca WHERE ca.id = candidate.shareable_cv_attachment_id) as cv_url FROM candidate JOIN users ON candidate.user_id = users.id WHERE true
table.fields: user_id INT(11) NOT NULL, birth_year INT(11), country_id INT(11), nationality_id INT(11), cv_url TEXT

table.name: test_jobseeker_certifications
table.populate:
SELECT CAST(candidate_number AS int) AS user_id, name as certification, institution, date_completed AS date FROM candidate JOIN users ON candidate.user_id = users.id JOIN candidate_certification ON candidate_certification.candidate_id = candidate.id WHERE
candidate_certification.name = regexp_replace(candidate_certification.name, '[^[:ascii:]]', '', 'g') AND candidate_certification.institution = regexp_replace(candidate_certification.institution, '[^[:ascii:]]', '', 'g')
table.fields: user_id INT(11), certification TEXT, institution TEXT, date DATE

table.name: test_jobseeker_degrees
table.populate:
SELECT CAST(candidate_number AS int) AS user_id, education_type, course_name, education_major.name as major, year_completed AS graduation, candidate_education.country_id, institution FROM candidate JOIN users ON candidate.user_id = users.id JOIN candidate_education on candidate.id = candidate_education.candidate_id JOIN education_major ON candidate.migration_education_major_id = education_major.id WHERE
education_major.name = regexp_replace(education_major.name, '[^[:ascii:]]', '', 'g')
table.fields: user_id INT(11) NOT NULL, education_type TEXT, course_name TEXT, major TEXT, graduation INT(11), country_id INT(11), institution TEXT

table.name: test_jobseeker_jobs
table.populate:
SELECT CAST(candidate_number AS int) AS user_id, candidate_job_experience.role as position_title, company_name, start_date, end_date, description, candidate_occupation_id as occupation_id, candidate_job_experience.country_id FROM candidate JOIN users ON candidate.user_id = users.id JOIN candidate_job_experience on candidate.id = candidate_job_experience.candidate_id WHERE
company_name = regexp_replace(company_name, '[^[:ascii:]]', '', 'g') AND candidate_job_experience.role = regexp_replace(candidate_job_experience.role, '[^[:ascii:]]', '', 'g')
table.fields: user_id INT(11) NOT NULL, position_title TEXT, company_name TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, description TEXT, occupation_id INT(11), country_id INT(11)

table.name: test_jobseeker_languages
table.populate: SELECT CAST(candidate_number AS int) AS user_id, language_id, spoken_level_id, written_level_id FROM candidate JOIN users ON candidate.user_id = users.id JOIN candidate_language on candidate.id = candidate_language.candidate_id
table.fields: user_id INT(11) NOT NULL, language_id INT(11), spoken_level_id INT(11), written_level_id INT(11)

table.name: test_jobseeker_skills
table.populate:
SELECT CAST(candidate_number AS int) AS user_id, skill, time_period FROM candidate JOIN users ON candidate.user_id = users.id JOIN candidate_skill on candidate.id = candidate_skill.candidate_id WHERE
skill = regexp_replace(skill, '[^[:ascii:]]', '', 'g')
table.fields: user_id INT(11) NOT NULL, skill TEXT, time_period TEXT
